h1.span: Solano Public Health Addresses School Closures

img.title: Picture of letter from Solano County Public Health with Link to pdf of letter
img.alt: Picture of letter from Solano County Public Health with Link to pdf of letter

div.p: Click the links below for either English or Spanish:

div.span: Travis Unified School District is committed to making travisusd.org compliant with the American with Disabilities Act. At this time we recognize that not all areas of our website may be ADA compliant. We are in the process of redesigning and creating new website content to be compliant with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines.
